1.content:
You got home late last night, you looked to your right and saw a odd light coming from the old closet. You open the door and you were blinded by the light and blacked out. When you came to you knew the you were not in your house anymore, you saw you were in a odd place, you later found out that you were in Wonderland and you were also shrunk.


Where in wonderland are you and how small are you?
1.title: In to Wonderland.

112.content:
You realize you are in queens land and you decide to try and grow back to normal size. You start to explore the world around you, marveling at the many normal things that are now skyscrapers. As you continue walking, the ground starts to shake and you hear a girl humming music. The ground starts to shake more violently and her voice becomes louder. All of a sudden, a girl in a blue dress comes around the corner. You call out to her, and she notices you. She picks you up and holds you to her face.

"Hello" she says. "My name is Alice. It is a pleasure to meet you." "Who are you?"

"My name is Matt and I don't know what happened to me." "Can you help me?"

"I could but I decided not to" She says with an evil grin. "Now what can I do with you?" She ponders for awhile and decides to...

WHAT HAPPENS NEXT? YOU DECIDE BELOW!!!!!!
112.title: Alice....

1122.content: With that evil grin growing wider Alice pulls back the dark blue dress she's wearing revealing her white undergarments then as she removes them as well you realize what she's about to do and yell out only your voice is completely inaudible to her huge ears "What's that speak up I can't understand you!" She mocks you cruelty "You said you want a closer look alright then." Her enormous butt gets bigger and bigger as you're being pulled into it as if by gravity as you scream and struggle to no avail Alice with a evil laugh shoves you right into its depths and
1122.title: Drops you into her booty

1123.content:
As you are being dangled in front of her face, you wonder what she is thinking of. You know your chances of survival are hopeless, but you wonder how you are going out. After a little thought, she starts to throw you around from one hand to the other. She does this for about 30 minuets before you are thrown extra high into the air. When you look down, you are modified.

You look down to see Alice's gaping maw. You can see down the back of her slimy blue throat. You begin to scream as you fall down her throat, and land in her stomach. You begin to pound on the walls to her stomach but you know it is hopeless. You start to relax, fall asleep and accept your faith.
1123.title: Eats you (END)

info.brief_description: You shrink and are found by Alice, The Red Queen, or Alice's Daughter Clarity.
